Question: On July 27, 2003, two months after his 100th birthday, this person died at his home in Toluca Lake, Los Angeles.
Hints: In the early days, this person's career included appearances on stage in Vaudeville shows and Broadway productions.
USNS this person (T-AKR-300) of the U.S Military Sealift Command was named after the performer in 1997.
This person worked as a butcher's assistant and a lineman in his teens and early twenties.
